title: Bug 120315 - Item with display property set to 'none' remains visible in PDF preview
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it is expected that the item should not be visible. However, in the new PDF emitter, the item remains visible even when the display property is set to 'none'.
OB: After setting the display property of an item to 'none' and previewing the document in PDF format, the label is still visible.
EB: After setting the display property of an item to 'none' and previewing the document in PDF format, the label should disappear.
SR:
1. Open the document in the application.
2. Locate the item with the display property set to 'none'.
3. Preview the document in PDF format.
4. Observe that the label associated with the item is still visible.
